triples.name: Network science
triples.relevance: Network science is the foundational field that this review is grounded in and uses as its primary framework.

triples.name: Complex system
triples.relevance: Understanding complex systems is the core motivation for studying higher-order networks.

triples.name: Synchronization network
triples.relevance: Synchronization dynamics on networks is one of the primary dynamical processes reviewed in this survey.

triples.name: Social contagion
triples.relevance: Contagion processes are a major category of dynamics studied on higher-order networks.

triples.name: Cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: Evolution of cooperation is one of the key dynamical phenomena discussed in the survey.

triples.name: Consensus dynamics
triples.relevance: Consensus formation is identified as a major dynamical process in higher-order networks.

triples.name: Graph theory
triples.relevance: Graph theory provides the mathematical foundation for representing and analyzing networks.

triples.name: Dynamical systems theory
triples.relevance: Dynamical systems theory is essential for understanding and analyzing the temporal evolution of processes on networks.
